data>load_polygons.yml@175|polygon_type.description: Type of polygon to load. Country or region polygons, World database of Protected Areas (WDPA), or Exclusive Economic Zones (EEZs)

data>load_polygons.yml@175|country_regio.description: Using the country chooser to select a region (region selections will be ignored as EEZs are national).

data>load_polygons.yml@175|buffer.description: Buffer for pulling transboundary protected areas (WDPA data only). The buffer will pull protected areas within that distance of the country border (in meters).
data>load_polygons.yml@175|buffer.label: Transboundary buffer
